long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Color picker tool for frontend devlopers and graphics artists. Create a color set, and copy it to css vars og Scss vars.

shift+s or click button to pick a color.
select color from list to delete or  copy individual color.
